attributes.action: Democratic Reform on the British Political System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
- A separate vote for Prime Minister and Member of Parliament.

- The Position of Prime Minister, or member of the Cabinet excludes the holder from being a Member of Parliament (To allow those constituents to have dedicated Members of Parliament).

- Fixed Election Dates every four years.

- Term Limits of the Prime Minister.

- Clearly Defined Constitution adopting ideals such as the Social Contract Theory and Separation of Powers.

- Triggers in place to spark an election if the Prime Minister Resigns/Dies/Leaves Office.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
